title: IT Business Engagement Manager
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

  

You want to be part of bringing digital transformations to life at Ericsson? In Enterprise IT we work in close collaboration with our business stakeholders to co-create digital solutions and secure delivery of IT capabilities for top prioritized business and process areas.

 **About this opportunity:**

  

We are seeking an IT Business Engagement Manager to lead and support on IT engagements & IT deliverables towards Product-, Next-generation Software and Network Deployment Project Business Flows in Portfolio-to-Cash, and for key strategic Group or Business Area initiatives.

  

We are here to ensure timely value delivery in all phases from conceptual design to released functionality supporting adoption. Here, you act as the Enterprise IT interface and represent EIT accountability to business stakeholders, including ensuring relevant operational governance. You will be accountable for extracting main risks and issues, drive mitigation and response on escalations, and follow-up with Sponsors. You will report to Madelene Gustavsson, Head of Business Flow, in Product Area Customer Experience, Enterprise IT in this role.

**What you will do:**
---------------------

  

* Facilitate alignment between execution teams, monitor progress, mitigate risks, and collaborate with stakeholders, ensuring timely and efficient execution aligned with transformation goals.
* Support the mobilization of Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and Product Owners to spearhead critical projects.
* Secure collaboration, communication, and governance within the Enterprise IT organization and stakeholders, driving key strategic initiatives forward
* Secure proposed solutions become scalable, stable and secure, and compliant with IT architectural strategy, IT processes & fundamentals before moving to production
* Facilitate the handover to the responsible IT Line organisation, ensuring seamless transition and continuity, including guiding principles’ adherence, follow-up on roles, and required competencies and capacity.
* Drive demand management between EIT and your business stakeholder, ensuring competence availability on time.
* Ensure IT Operations budget is secured for successful delivery
**The skills you bring**
------------------------

  

* 5+ years of experience in executing Digital Transformation within Business and IT
* Experience of managing large-scale IT deliveries involving multiple system domains
* Proven strengths to manage stakeholder expectations and aligning digital initiatives vs business priorities
* Experience from agile development using agile delivery methodologies in an enterprise setting
* Good understanding of IT digital technologies, processes and tools
Experience of complexities to large system landscapes with multiple integrations  
* 

**About you**

* You initiate action, curiously seek opportunities and mitigate risks, and adopt flexibly to follow through and deliver results
* You build trust, good working relationships, and communicate and collaborate effectively
* Informal leadership capability, with demonstrated ability to encourage and mobilize cross-functional teams toward shared objectives.

 **Good to have**

* PMI or PMP certification (preferred)
* A bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant field
* Business experience from BA/MA/CU (preferred)

 ***Preferred location: Stockholm. However, remote location in nearby time-zone may also be considered.***
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: Desktop Support Technician
description:
**Job title : Desktop Technician (VIP Support)** 




**Location : Stockholm - Sweden** 




**Mode : Contract** 




**Language: Swedish** 








**Job Description:** 




 Position Responsibilities and Functions
 


* Provide first/second level contact and problem resolution for customer issues.
* Handling VIP Users
* Work with vendors to remediate complex AV issues as needed.
* Provide timely communication on issue status and resolution.
* Maintain ticket updates for all reported incidents.
* Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot XP, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 and Microsoft Office 2010, Cisco Jabber, another authorized desktop application.
* Should have basic knowledge of Mac operating system, to support Apple pc users.
* Install, upgrade, support and troubleshoot for printers, computer hardware.
* Performs general preventative maintenance tasks on computers, laptops, printers.
* Performs remedial repairs on Desktops, laptops, printers and any other authorized peripheral equipment.
* Use diagnostic tools to troubleshoot problems associated with network connectivity, and workstation hardware/software.
* Broad experience of IT with basic understanding of Networks, Servers, Audio/Visual, Smart Devices and Telecoms.
* This position requires the ability to work in a project-based environment requiring flexibility and teamwork. Performs other duties as assigned.
* VIP User Support



  





 Candidate Required Minimum Qualifications and Skills
 


* Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent in Computer Science or related field.
* CompTIA A+, Microsoft Certified Professional (MCP) or better.
* Minimum of 18 months years of IT experience.
* Windows 7-10, Microsoft Active Directory, utilization of GPOs, MS Office 365, PC hardware installation and troubleshooting, Enterprise anti-virus solutions, Helpdesk ticketing systems.
* Mobile device management including IOS and Android devices, Enterprise encryption solutions, Windows PC/laptop management via Active Directory.
* Excellent communication relationship-building and internal customer service skills.
* Adaptable and flexible in a fast-changing industry and work environment.
* Willing to work off-hours and weekends when required for projects or emergency support.

title: IT Systems Specialist
description:
**About Us** 




 PCB Connect is a leading international sales company specializing in Printed Circuit Boards, with 18 global locations including Europe, the USA, Brazil, China, and the Philippines. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality products and exceptional service to our diverse clientele. We are now seeking an
 **IT Systems Specialist** 
 to join our team in Stockholm.
 



  





**Job Responsibilities** 




 As an IT Systems Specialist, you will play a key role in maintaining and developing our IT infrastructure. You will focus on
 **Microsoft 365 administration, IT support, and system optimization** 
 , while also contributing to global IT projects. You will collaborate with colleagues worldwide to ensure that our technical solutions are efficient, secure, and support smooth international operations.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Administer and optimize our Microsoft 365 environment, including SharePoint, OneDrive, Teams, and Exchange.
* Provide IT support to employees across different time zones.
* Ensure IT systems and databases comply with security standards and best practices.
* Participate in IT projects related to system development and new implementations.
* Document and improve internal IT processes to support global efficiency.



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proven experience with Microsoft 365 and Power Automate.
* Experience in IT support, ideally in a multinational environment.
* Knowledge of IT security and cloud-based solutions.
* Strong communication skills with international teams.
* Ability to handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced setting.
* Education in IT, computer science, or related field.



  





**Preferred:** 



* ITIL framework knowledge.
* Experience with ISO 27001.
* Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 knowledge.
* SQL database experience.



  





**What we offer** 



* A dynamic and international work environment.
* Opportunities for personal and professional growth.
* Flexible hours and possibility of remote work.
* Competitive salary and benefits.



  





**Company Overview:** 




 We are an SME with our HQ based in Sweden and ambitious global plans. PCB Connect has become one of the leading suppliers of printed circuit boards since its establishment in Stockholm in 2004. We adapt to changing needs, and find and present solutions, not limitations. Your needs - our solution. PCB Connect is organized as a corporate group, PCB Connect Holding AB and 11 other companies spread over 18 different countries, employing around 130 people with a turnover of around 50m USD.

title: IT Systems Engineer
description:
**About Planet**
 Planet is a global provider of integrated technology and payments solutions for retail and hospitality customers.
   

  

 We create great experiences for the millions of people who use our payments, software, and tax-free solutions every minute of every day.
   

  

 Planet empowers its customers to deliver great customer experiences by combining payments and software in ways that drive greater loyalty, increase revenue and save time.
   

  

 Founded over 35 years ago and with our headquarters in London, today we have more than 2,500 employees located across six continents serving our customers in more than 120 markets.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 As an IT Systems Engineer, you are responsible for our Data Center in Stockholm and for the maintenance, administration and installation of our server systems and our network. Do you already have experience in the areas mentioned and would you like to learn about new areas? You are willing to be part of oncall responsibility out of busines hours ? Then you've come to the right place!
   

  

 We work with agile development methods and use Atlassian Jira and Confluene.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Maintenance, administration & installation of server systems (Windows, Linux)
* Administration of the network infrastructure
* Administration of our VMware Virtualization environment
* Administration of the Data Recovery Tool veeam
* IT hardware preparation and provisioning
* Software distribution and software standardization
* Monitoring the IT landscape
* Creation, review and updating of IT documentation and the IT emergency concept
* Participation in IT projects and continuous improvement of the IT landscape
* ITSM-based way of working with Jira


**Who You Are**
* Completed training as an IT systems integration specialist, a degree in computer science or a comparable professional qualification
* Professional experience as an IT Systems Engineer
* Good knowledge of written and spoken English
* Ability to work under pressure and a high level of motivation
* Willingness to participate on our rolling oncall duty out of business hours
* A structured, independent and goal-oriented way of working
* A sense of responsibility for yourself, your actions and your professional progress
* Analytical skills and strong problem-solving skills
* Willingness to acquire new knowledge and participate in training and certifications
* The position requires on-call availability on a rotational basis, one week per month.


**Why Planet**
 Planet is an equal opportunity employer where diversity is valued, and all employment is decided based on qualifications, merit, and business need.
   

  

 Come and grow your career in the most exciting, fast paced technology market, with a business that delivers feel-good connected commerce.
   

  

 At Planet, we embrace a hybrid work model, with three days a week in the office.
   

  

 Reasonable accommodations may be made in order to allow for an individual to perform the essential functions of this role successfully.

title: IT-tekniker med driftansvar
description:
**Vill du vara med och driva IT-driften i ett snabbväxande logistikbolag med starkt hållbarhetsfokus? Vi söker dig som vill vara med och bygga en IT-drift i framkant och bidra till att vår IT-miljö fungerar stabilt, säkert och effektivt.**
 Om tjänsten
   

  

 Som driftansvarig hos Best Transport driver du det operativa arbetet för vår IT-drift. I samarbete med våra leverantörer hanterar du workplace-tjänster, jobbar proaktivt med våra IT-drift och driver förbättringsinitiativ för en verksamhetsnära, stabil och säker IT-leverans. Du blir en del av vårt IT-team tillsammans med systemförvaltare och utvecklare. Rollen innebär även resor till våra kontor i Sverige och utomlands vid behov.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden**
* Övergripande ansvar för den dagliga operativa IT-driften
* Samordning med externa leverantörer för att säkerställa en stabil och säker IT-drift
* Tillgodose verksamhetens behov av IT-drift
* Övervakning och hantering av driftstörningar, incidenter och förändringar
* Deltagande i tekniska projekt inom drift, säkerhet och automatisering
* Bidra till IT-säkerhetsarbetet
* Teknisk stöttning till användare och interna team vid behov


 Om dig
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av IT-drift och ett stort tekniskt intresse. Du är lösningsorienterad, strukturerad och har god samarbetsförmåga. Men framförallt nyfiken och engagerad. Humor är ett måste!
   

  

 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av M365, nätverk och serverdrift.
   

  

 Det är meriterande om du haft en liknande roll tidigare, eller om du har erfarenhet av molntjänster och IT-säkerhet.
   

  

 Det här erbjuder vi
   

  

 🧡 På vår arbetsplats ska du som jobbar växa, ha kul men framför allt – du ska utvecklas! Best är en snabbfotad organisation med stort driv och eftersom vi hela tiden växer finns det stora utvecklingsmöjligheter hos oss. Vår kultur präglas av en hjälpsam och snäll atmosfär där alla medarbetare uppmuntras att bidra med sina unika färdigheter.
   

  

 🧡 Vi erbjuder ett attraktivt jobb på ett framgångsrikt och lönsamt logistikbolag. Best har kollektivavtal med Biltrafikens Arbetsgivareförbund och vi erbjuder våra medarbetare friskvårdsbidrag.
   

  

 🧡 Best har ett stort hållbarhetsfokus. Engagemanget för hållbarhet genomsyrar vår organisation och våra medarbetare medverkar aktivt till att vi ska uppnå våra högt uppsatta mål. Vi tror att du som också tycker hållbarhet är viktigt kommer trivas hos oss!
   

  

 Om oss
   

  

 Best har sedan 1976 erbjudit företag prisvärda logistiklösningar och är idag en ledande aktör i Sverige och Norge inom last-mile. Företaget utför dagligen, med hjälp av innovativa tech-lösningar, tiotusentals snabba och hållbara expressleveranser och distributionsuppdrag.
   

  

 Best har med sitt express- och distributionserbjudande kunder inom vitt skilda branscher och av varierande storlek. Företaget är även specialiserat inom ett antal koncept såsom Servicelogistik och Healthcare-logistik.
   

  

 Best är idag logistikbranschens klarast lysande hållbarhetsprofil, framför allt tack vare den fossilfria fordonsflottan där elbilarna snabbt ökar i antal och företagets fokus på schyssta villkor och krav på kollektivavtal.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

**Tillträde:** 
 Omgående
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Stockholm, Johanneshov
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100%
   

  

**Anställningsform:** 
 Tillsvidareanställning
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan
   

  

 Vi genomför intervjuer löpande och rekommenderar därför att du skickar in din ansökan så snart som möjligt, dock senast den 1:a december. Tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden löpt ut.

title: IT-Infrastructure Security Specialist
description:
Vill du utvecklas inom cybersäkerhet samtidigt som du arbetar nära modern infrastruktur i en internationell miljö? Här får du en roll där du verkligen ser effekten av ditt arbete. Du blir en del av en organisation som värdesätter kvalitet, lärande och långsiktighet, och där säkerhet är en central del av verksamhetens framgång.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Du arbetar i skärningspunkten mellan lokal IT och global säkerhet. Det innebär att du både får arbeta hands-on i infrastrukturen och delta i analyser, förbättringar och säkerhetsrelaterade initiativ. Miljön är tekniskt varierad med tydliga processer och höga krav. Perfekt för dig som vill växa och bygga bred teknisk och säkerhetsmässig kompetens.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter:**
* Implementera och förbättra säkerhetskonfigurationer enligt gällande standarder (CIS, NIST, ISO 27001)
* Vara stöd och rådgivare i säkerhetsfrågor för lokala team
* Delta i revisioner, sårbarhetsarbeten och penetrationstester
* Hantera incidenter i samarbete med SOC
* Administrera Windows Server, Active Directory, Group Policy, DNS och DHCP
* Utföra patchhantering via Ivanti EPM eller WSUS och följa upp resultat
* Arbeta i VMware-miljöer inklusive provisionering, resurshantering och underhåll
* Bidra i drift, förändringshantering och säkerhetshärdningar


**Vi tror att du har:**
* 2–5 års erfarenhet inom IT-infrastruktur eller cybersäkerhet
* Kunskap om Windows Server, AD och Group Policy
* Förståelse för grundläggande säkerhetsprinciper
* Erfarenhet av patchhantering och sårbarhetsarbeten
* Grundläggande erfarenhet av VMware och PowerShell
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska


**Meriterande om du också har:**
* Erfarenhet från industri- eller produktionsmiljö
* Kännedom om OT-system
* Certifieringar inom t.ex. CompTIA Security+, Microsoft eller ISO 27001
* Erfarenhet av SIEM och incidenthantering


**Vem vi söker:**
 Du uppskattar att arbeta strukturerat, lösa problem och bidra till trygga och stabila IT-miljöer. Du gillar att utvecklas och lära dig nytt, och känner dig bekväm i en roll där du samarbetar med andra och har många kontaktytor. Du trivs när teknik, säkerhet och ansvar går hand i hand.
   

  

**Om CONSULTING it:**
 När du börjar hos oss som konsult på CONSULTING it blir du en del av vår gemenskap. Du får dessutom kollegor runt om i Sverige! Du har en dedikerad konsultchef som stöttar dig och din utveckling. Vi hjälper dig hitta nya vägar genom att prova på nya roller och nya branscher, för oss är det viktigt att du trivs på din arbetsplats. Vi ser till att du hamnar på ett bra bolag under ditt uppdrag och att uppdragen ligger i linje med hur du vill utvecklas framöver. Oavsett vad det blir, står vi bakom dig hela vägen – i ditt nästa, nästa och nästa steg. Gå med i vårt team och ta del av en spännande och utvecklande arbetsmiljö!

title: Erfarna och affärsorienterade konsulter inom AI & Data till Deloitte, Technology & Transformation
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of audit and assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax, and related services. During its 175-year history, our organization has grown tremendously in both scale and capabilities. Deloitte currently has approximately 457,000+ people in more than 150 countries and territories, and serves four out of five Fortune Global 500® companies. Yet, our shared culture and mission—to make an impact that matters—remains unchanged. This is evident not only in Deloitte’s work for clients, but also in our WorldClass ambition, our WorldClimate initiative and our ALL IN diversity and inclusion strategy.
   

  

  

  




**Jobbeskrivning**

 Deloittes affärsområde Technology & Transformation Nordic är marknadsledande och samarbetar med beslutsfattare i globala och lokala organisationer. Vi stöttar organisationer i deras utmaningar gällande strategiska frågor och i implementeringen av komplexa transformationer som ofta inkluderar stora affärsdrivna IT-förändringar.
   

  





 Deloittes AI- och datateam växer och söker seniora ledare med passion för AI, data och strategisk rådgivning. Vi ser en stark efterfrågan på Deloitte och våra tjänsteerbjudanden och behöver mer senior kapacitet för att kunna hjälpa våra kunder, öka storleken på vår affär, och för att supportera teamet. Vi har partnerskap med marknadsledande leverantörer som gör att vi kan befinna oss i framkant av ny teknologi.
   

  





 Din roll kommer, tillsammans med andra ledare inom AI och data, att bidra till att driva Deloittes marknadserbjudanden framåt på marknaden, arbeta i kundprojekt samt leda och utveckla våra juniora kollegor.
   

  





**I denna roll får du:**



* Leda och driva högprioriterade AI-, analys- och datatransformationsinitiativ från start till mål – från strategi till implementation
* Bygga affärsrelationer och agera rådgivare för C-level och seniora intressenter för att upptäcka nya möjligheter
* Utveckla och följa upp en pipeline av affärsmöjligheter och driva relevanta offerter och anbudsförfrågningar (RFP/RFI)
* Arbeta med affärsutvecklingsorienterade aktiviteter och driva adoptionen av nästa generations- AI- och dataplattformar samt säkerställa att organisationer ligger före branschtrender
* Utveckla ett högpresterande mångsidigt team och coacha kollegor i deras utveckling
* Hjälpa till med rekrytering av nya talanger


**Kvalifikationer**

 Vi söker dig som:
   

  




* Har Bachelor/Master inom systemvetenskap, är ingenjör eller ekonom
* Talar flytande svenska och är bosatt i Sverige
* Har en teknisk kunskap och intresse inom maskininlärning, data science och dataanalys
* Har 8-12 års erfarenhet från konsultbranschen av att leverera projekt, med en påvisbar förmåga att uppnå intäktsmål
* Har goda kommunikations- och presentationsförmågor
* Har förmåga att effektivt förmedla komplexa tekniska koncept till både tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper


**Ytterligare information**

**Hur du ansöker**




 Du ansöker online. Vi uppmuntrar dig att skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt eftersom vi granskar ansökningar löpande och håller intervjuer kontinuerligt. Vänligen bifoga ditt CV, personligt brev och dina universitetsbetyg i din ansökan.
   

  





 Som en kvalitativ del av Deloittes rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll för att öka medvetenheten om våra framtida medarbetare, säkerställa arbetsmiljön för våra anställda och uppfylla regulatoriska krav. Bakgrundskontrollen genomförs i samarbete med ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  





**Frågor?**




 Om du har några frågor angående rollen, vänligen kontakta Sam Mottaghi på smottaghi@deloitte.se. För frågor gällande ansökningsprocessen, vänligen kontakta Anna Taube på
 
 ataube@deloitte.se
   

  






 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  





**What impact will you make?**




 På Deloitte gör ditt arbete en meningsfull skillnad, varje dag, medan du växer i en inkluderande företagskultur av samarbete och hög prestation. Utöver att skapa lösningar strävar vi efter att göra en positiv och avgörande skillnad för andra i vår omgivning, våra klienter och samhället. På Deloitte hittar du tidigare dolda möjligheter att lyckas och inser din fulla potential.

title: Consultants & Senior Consultants | Operations Transformation - Financial Services | Stockholm
description:
Deloitte is a leading global provider of audit and assurance, consulting, financial advisory, risk advisory, tax, and related services. During its 175-year history, our organization has grown tremendously in both scale and capabilities. Deloitte currently has approximately 457,000 people in more than 150 countries and territories and serves four out of five Fortune Global 500® companies. Yet, our shared culture and mission—to make an impact that matters—remains unchanged.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Are you ready for the next step in your career and to be part of our successful team in Sweden? Deloitte is a market leader in Sweden, collaborating with decision-makers in both global and local organisations. As a consultant within Operations Transformation, you will be part of a team with diverse backgrounds and expertise in Banking & Capital Markets, Asset & Wealth Management, and Insurance.
   

  





 You will help clients in the Financial Services industry innovate and transform their organisations, core business systems and business models. This includes driving business transformation, consolidating, or implementing new systems and processes, implementing new regulations in operations and IT systems, driving strategic cost optimisations, improving operational efficiency, designing and implementing new operating models and leading large-scale multi-unit transformations.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 We are looking for people who enjoy working together with colleagues and clients in the Financial Services industry in a team environment, helping them driving projects and solving business challenges. You are curious and driven with the ability to leverage your strengths and collaborate to achieve the best results.
   

  





**Requirements to succeed in this role:**



* 1-4 years' experience from a leading Management Consulting firm, and/or from business development within the Financial Services Industry


* Bachelor's or Master's degree within relevant fields (business, industrial engineering or similar)



**You should be able to demonstrate experience from one or several of the following areas:**



* Project management, program management or product management


* Business development or change initiatives


* The intersection between business and IT, including system implementation, system migration and vendor selection


* Regulatory transformation


* Operating model transformation


* Agile methodology



**As a person, we believe you are:**



* Outgoing and enjoy working in a team
* Analytical and enjoy working with and solving complex problems
* Highly driven
* Thrive in an environment focused on feedback and development
* Willing to walk the extra mile when needed and travel for business purposes
* A strong communicator and fluent in both Swedish and English


**Additional Information**

**We offer**



* Access to a global firm and a powerful network of experienced colleagues
* Great possibilities for you to develop yourself and our business
* Many opportunities for exchange of experiences, training and personal development
* Access to one of the world's largest consultancy organizations, global training programs and specialist networks
* A chance of becoming a key player with a fast growing career, in the national and global consulting arena
* Competitive compensation and benefits



**How to apply**




 You apply online. Please submit your CV, short motivation and university grades as part of your application.
   

  





 As a qualitative part of Deloitte's recruitment process, our final candidates undergo a background check, to increase awareness of our future employees, secure the working environment for our employees and meet regulatory requirements. The background check process is carried out in collaboration with ToFindOut. https://tofindout.se/en/background-check/
   

  

  

  

**Questions?**




 For questions regarding the role or application process, please contact Anna Taube, ataube@deloitte.se
   

  





 We are looking forward to your application!
   

  





**What impact will you make?**




 Every day, your work will make an impact that matters, while you thrive in a dynamic culture of inclusion, collaboration and high performance. We do not just aspire to make solutions. We wish to create an impact that makes a positive and crucial difference for the people around us, our clients and our society. Deloitte is where you’ll find unlimited opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

title: Senior Data Engineer to IT Data & Analytics Team  | SEB Life & Pension, Solna
description:
*SEB is a leading northern European financial services group, and at the same time, one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. In the SEB Group, the subsidiary SEB Life & Pension has its IT organization, developing and managing the Life & Pension company’s IT solutions while collaborating with the broader SEB IT community.*
 The pension savings market in Sweden is currently undergoing substantial changes, where there are vast opportunities and great business potential, and we are currently investing in re-designing our products and creating new digital offerings. Our developers work hard to re-engineer our IT solutions and future-proof our architecture because it genuinely makes a significant impact on our customers, distributors, and colleagues.
   

  

 Now we are looking for new talent to join this journey. If you are passionate about technology and want to make an impact, this could be the opportunity for you.
   

  

 We are currently looking for a
 **Senior Data Engineer** 
 with several years of experience in Data Warehousing to strengthen our Data and Analytics team at SEB Pension & Försäkring.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Senior Data Engineer you’ll primarily work in our two main data platforms, based on
 **SQL Server** 
 (SSIS). Work consists of both maintenance and development tasks. The team has also started to investigate Google cloud platform and once you’re familiar with the main platforms you’ll be able to start contributing to that work. However, please note that the majority of your tasks will be done on SQL Server (SSIS) for the foreseeable future.
   

  

**You Will Be Responsible For**
* Designing, developing and maintaining SEB Pension & Försäkring’s Data Warehouses ­ including ETLs in SSIS (C#)
* Design and develop the new cloud-based solution in Google cloud platform (GCP)
* Work closely with BI developers and business analysts to support data requirements for reporting and analysis


**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Several years of experience working with DW development (SSIS ETL, SQL Server)
* Programming languages: T-SQL, C#
* Databases: MSSQL
* Strong understanding and experience of Data Warehouse Principles and Designs.
* Analytical skills and able to handle complex information
* Excellent problem-solving skills and strong sense of responsibility
* Great communication skills and fluency in English, spoken and written


**Meriting**
* Experience in the Google cloud platform (GCP) based data apps
* Python
* Tableau or Qlikview
* Test automation
* Agile ways of working, both SCRUM and scaled agile frameworks
* Fluency in Swedish


**What We Offer**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment
* Hybrid work model, meaning remote work is possible up to 2 days/week
* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to join?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than
 **23rd of November 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Henry Molander, Head of IT Data and Analytics by email henry.molander@seb.se, but we will not accept applications through e-mail.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 www.sebgroup.com/career.
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Hello,** 




  





**I hope you are doing good.** 




  





**Position – Data Enginner** 




**Location – Stockholm, Sweden (Onsite)** 




**Experience - 6+ Years** 




**Language - English** 




**Duration - 6 months B2B Contract, It's extendable.** 




  





**Job Description**




  





**Tech stack - MUST have:** 




 1. GCP service – (bigquery, cloud run, cloud functions, pubsub, dataflow, cloud composer, etc.)
 



 2. SQL
 



 3. Python
 



 4. DBT
 



 5. Terraform
 



  





**Soft skills:** 




 1. GitHub
 



 2. DevOps
 



 3. CICD
 



 4. Communication skills
 



 5. Agile Methodologies
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 1. Take end-to-end responsibility to build, optimize and support of existing and new data products towards the defined target vision
 



 2. Be a champion of DevOps mindset and principles and able to manage CI/CD pipelines and terraform as well as Cloud infrastructure, in our context, it is GCP (Google Cloud Platform).
 



 3. Ensure that our built data products work as independent units of deployment and non-functional aspects of the data products follow the defined standards for security, scalability, observability, and performance.

title: VMware-specialist
description:
**Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.**
**Rollen**
 Som virtualiseringsspecialist arbetar du med att installera, konfigurera, felsöka och optimera prestandan i VMware-miljön. Du bidrar till att utveckla och förbättra organisationens infrastruktur genom analys, strukturering och implementering av nya lösningar. Du säkerställer att plattformen stödjer den arkitekturella målbilden och arbetar löpande med behovsinsamling, omvärldsbevakning och prioritering av initiativ för att driva plattformen framåt.
   

  

**Erfarenhet**
* Har gedigen erfarenhet av virtualisering av VMware-plattformen såväl som arbete med IT-infrastruktur och datacenter.
* Har gedigen kunskap inom Vmware och Vmwareprodukter som (NSX-T, NSX-V, vSAN, vSphere, ESXI, ESX, vRealize etc).
* Minst 8 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet av VMware
* Goda kunskaper om bland annat patchning, övervakning, backup/restore m.m
* Goda kunskaper om Windows Powershell och/eller andra scriptspråk


**Meriterande**
* Certifieringar inom Microsoft såsom MCSA, MCSE eller liknande
* Certifieringar inom Veeam, Red hat eller liknande


 Låter detta någorlunda som du? Hojta till så tar vi ett möte redan nästa vecka! // Charlotta
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.
   

  

**Om Castra**
 Castra är en entreprenörsdriven konsultgrupp inom IT, management och systemutveckling. Bolaget ägs gemensamt av medarbetarna och tillsammans bygger vi det företag vi själva vill jobba på.
   

  

 Vår vision är att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för konsulter. Att vi blivit certifierade av Great Place to Work® fem år i rad är ett bevis på våra höga mål kring företagskultur. Våra tankar om delaktighet, påverkansmöjligheter och respekt för individens egna val och möjligheter fungerar.
   

  

 Företaget har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Sundsvall, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida www.castra.se.
   

  

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?** 
 Sök direkt via länken eller kontakta Charlotta.Ljung@@castra.se Tfn: 072-871 63 12

title: Platform Engineer | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
We’re seeking a skilled and passionate
 **Platform Engineer** 
 with a solid background in software development to help us build the next generation of secure and automated
 **API solutions and CI/CD pipelines** 
 . In this role, you’ll join a team that supports and empowers other development teams across the organization. Our team’s focus areas include
 **API automation, integration solutions for APIs, and CI/CD pipeline development** 
 .
   

  

 Are you excited about working with cutting-edge technologies in a dynamic environment? Then you might be the person we’re looking for!
   

  

**About The Role**
 You will design, develop, and maintain our automated solutions within the API domain — enabling development teams to both create APIs and efficiently consume partner APIs. You will also implement automated quality and security checks in our CI/CD pipeline products, following
 **DevSecOps** 
 principles.
   

  

 The role involves close collaboration with developers, architects, security specialists, and operations teams to ensure our solutions are secure, scalable, and efficient. You’ll drive improvements in code quality, test automation, and security monitoring.
   

  

 In this role, you’ll work with technologies such as
 **Java, Groovy, Bash, TypeScript, JavaScript, React, and** 
**Next.js** 
 .
   

  

 Who you are
   

  

 We’re looking for a
 **driven and experienced Platform Engineer** 
 with hands-on experience in
 **automated build and deployment environments** 
 (e.g. Jenkins, GitHub Actions, TypeScript) and
 **container technologies** 
 (Docker, Kubernetes).
   

  

 To thrive in this role, you are proactive, solution-oriented, and committed. You have strong communication skills and can maintain effective collaboration both within your own team and with other teams that use our products. Since you’ll be working with multiple teams, you need to be fluent in
 **Swedish and English** 
 , both spoken and written.
   

  

**Meriting Qualifications**
 Experience with
 **OpenShift, Google Cloud, or Azure**
 Knowledge of
 **RESTful API design** 
 and
 **microservice architecture**
 What we offer
   

  

 A dynamic work environment where you’ll have the opportunity to shape our technical solutions and contribute to our team’s development. You’ll work with modern technologies and platforms alongside a highly skilled and collaborative team with deep technical expertise.
   

  

 You’ll be part of some of SEB Kort’s most strategic and business-critical areas. We have a strong culture of knowledge sharing, teamwork, and mutual support. A healthy work-life balance is important to us, and we offer flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely a few days per week.
   

  

 Do you want to be part of SEB?
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **9th of November 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Håkan Abrahamsson on hakan.abrahamsson@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Senior IT Test Automation Engineer - Stockholm
description:
**About Justera Group**
 Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 We are seeking a highly skilled
 **Senior IT Test Automation Engineer** 
 to join our team and contribute to the delivery of reliable, high-quality IT systems. This role involves working across multiple testing disciplines and technologies, with a particular focus on microservices-based architectures. The ideal candidate is a proactive problem solver who excels in designing, implementing, and maintaining robust automated testing solutions.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Analyze business and technical requirements to design comprehensive test strategies, plans, and test cases.
* Identify and define test scenarios across functional, integration, and technical layers.
* Develop and maintain scalable, automated test frameworks and solutions from the ground up.
* Prepare, manage, and optimize test data and test environments.
* Perform testing of microservices and RESTful APIs, ensuring proper isolation and handling of dependencies.
* Collaborate effectively within Agile, Scrum, or SAFe teams, supporting CI/CD and DevOps initiatives.
* Contribute to continuous improvement of testing practices, tools, and methodologies.


**Requirements:**
* Programming: Strong proficiency in Java 21, with a solid understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns.
* Testing Expertise:
+ Test Data Management
+ Test Environment Management
+ Test Management
+ Automated Functional Testing
+ Functional Testing
+ Performance Testing
+ Technical and Web Services Testing

* Tools & Technologies:
+ RESTful API testing (HTTP methods, status codes, headers)
+ SQL and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
+ Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices

* Architecture: Deep understanding of microservices principles, design, and implementation.
* Languages: Fluent in English (spoken and written).
* ISTQB Agile Tester certification (or willingness to obtain)
* ISTQB Foundation Level certification (or willingness to obtain)
* ISTQB Test Automation Engineer certification (or willingness to obtain)


**What We Offer:**
* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Senior Infrastructure and Data Platform Engineer
description:
**About the Company** 




 We are a European tech innovator operating a high-volume digital operations platform. We’re established and scaling to lead in our domain, leveraging modern technology and an agile approach to continuously improve our operations. We use data, AI, automation, and modern cloud architectures to run efficient supply chains and optimize product lifecycle decisions.
 



  





 There is a healthy growth pace supported by long-term planning and solid investment. The culture values ownership, collaboration, and building practical solutions that improve efficiency, reliability, and long-term operational performance.
 



  





**About the Role:** 
 You will join as a Senior Infrastructure & Data Platform Engineer, responsible for designing, scaling, and operating the company’s modern data and infrastructure platform. The platform processes high-volume product, logistics, and operational data and supports advanced analytics, AI, and ML-driven decision models. This is a hands-on, impactful role where infrastructure reliability, data quality, and scalability are core priorities.
 



  





**What You Will Work On** 



* Design, maintain, and evolve the cloud-based data platform
* Build and manage infrastructure using IaC (Terraform or similar)
* Implement CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment workflows
* Design for reliability, scalability, and operational transparency
* Work closely with engineers across data, backend, and platform domains to deliver data where it brings value
* Establish maintainable engineering practices and platform conventions



  





**Who You Are** 



* You have strong hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure and data platform engineering
* You enjoy solving concrete operational challenges, not just theoretical architecture
* You collaborate well in small, skilled teams and contribute to shared solutions
* You are curious, pragmatic, and value clarity and reliability in engineering work



  





**What’s Offered** 



* Attractive salary, pension, and a range of employment benefits
* Hybrid setup (typically 2–3 days/week in the Stockholm office)
* A role with ownership, autonomy, and real influence on technical direction
* A product-driven environment where engineering decisions directly impact outcomes
* Opportunity to shape a scalable data foundation supporting advanced analytics and emerging ML capabilities

title: Cloud & AI Platforms Sales Specialist
description:
Join our team of experienced solution sales specialists and technical experts to help our most important customers achieve secure digital and AI transformation with Microsoft’s Cloud & AI Platforms.
   

  

 Our ambition is to truly partner with our customers for long-term success, always finding new ways for them to achieve more through the possibilities of technology, AI, and robust security.
   

  

 As a Cloud & AI Platforms Sales Specialist, you’ll work as a trusted advisor—equipped with both business and technical expertise—engaging with senior decision makers to uncover transformation initiatives. You’ll orchestrate and lead a virtual team of technical experts, partners, and consultants to advance the sales process and exceed solution sales and consumption targets. You’ll help customers evaluate their cloud and AI strategy, determine approaches to application and data migration and modernization, and recommend secure, innovative solutions that meet their requirements.
   

  

 You’ll build and maintain relationships at the C-suite level, influence long-term strategic direction, and act as a trusted advisor driving engagement with technology decision makers.
   

  

 Your passion for learning, high emotional intelligence, and executive presence will help you identify projects, build compelling business cases, and drive cloud and AI adoption from vision to production.
   

  

**Ready to make an impact? Apply now and help organizations realize their potential with the power of secure cloud and AI innovation!**
 Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Sales Execution
   

  

* Engages in conversations with customers aligned to their industry to introduce how other workloads could enable digital transformation areas that is aligned with the customer's industry and turns opportunities into deals. Initiates conversations with customers on digital transformation in one or more solution areas, in collaboration with partners and services. Creates guiding examples of digital transformation through seminars, workshops, webinars, and direct engagement.
* Collaborates with team members to discover new opportunities. Drives incremental revenue growth through personal campaigns (e.g., portfolio analysis) or internal sources (e.g., Marketing). Collaborates with account teams, partners, or services to track and qualify new opportunities. Collaborates with other teams (e.g., account teams) and services to build pipeline. Interfaces with customers and builds relationships via social selling. Applies Microsoft's sales process (MSP) to determine the quality of the opportunity and whether to proceed.
* Identifies opportunities to drive consumption and grow business with existing customers by initiating conversations, providing demos or quotes, and collaborating with partners or internal teams (e.g., Technical Sales Professionals, Global Black Belts. For licensing transactions and project engagements, ensures rapid and robust deployment plan at point of sale that is validated by services and partners.
* Identifies customer business needs and technology readiness. Contributes to the development of solutions in collaboration with internal teams, partners, and services. Proposes prioritized solutions that align with customers' needs. Articulates the business value of proposed solutions.
* Proactively builds external stakeholders' mapping. Collaborates with account teams (e.g., Account Executives) to identify and engage senior business subject matter decision makers at the customer's/partner's business.
* Implements strategies to accelerate the closing of deals. Contributes input on strategies to drive and close prioritized opportunities. Coaches less experienced team members in deal plan execution. Implements close plans (e.g., how to map timeline, engage the customer, get customer buy-in and commitment) to de-risk and drive predictable deal closure.


 Scaling and Collaboration
   

  

* Collaborates with One Commercial Partner (OCP) and with a network of partners to cross-sell and up-sell. Identifies new partners by researching and discussing with partners on customer scenarios. Develops joint proposal with partners. Contributes to developing partner strategies to address gaps in partner capabilities.
* Applies the orchestration model to leverage and expand relationships with internal stakeholders and partners (e.g., Enterprise Operating Unit). Navigates the MSFT organization to bring the best impact to the customer.


 Technical Expertise
   

  

* Leads conversations and sets up events within Microsoft. Mentors others and develops strategies for best practice sharing across subsidiaries. Contributes ideas that can be instituted across Microsoft.
* Initiates conversations with prospective customers/partners at events to expand external network. Acts as a subject matter expert in one or more solution area(s).\*
* Collaborates with the 'compete' global black belts (GBB) to analyze competitor products, solutions, and/or services and implements strategies to position Microsoft against competitors in customer communication. Proactively provides analysis of the competitive landscape in supported solution area. Evaluates opportunities and makes recommendations on pursuit or withdrawal. Holistic value of MSFT platform versus single-point solution that positions MSFT favorably against competitors.


 Sales Excellence
   

  

* Collaborates with partners and resources and leverages customer insights or industry knowledge. Contributes to exploring business and emerging opportunities to optimize the portfolio and support customer innovation.
* Reviews feedback report and coaches others on ensuring customer/partner satisfaction and decreasing dissatisfaction by establishing recovery action plans to improve clients' overall experience. Manages and/or orchestrates sales and delivery success through the account team and pursuit team.
* Engages with internal and external stakeholders on business planning, Rhythm of Business (ROB) meetings to review and plan for accounts in the assigned territory.
* Collaborates with extended sales team, partners, and marketing to conduct business analysis (e.g., whitespace analysis, identify industry trends) to pursue high-potential customers and develop a target list of potential business.
* Manages the end-to-end business of the assigned territory. Conducts forecasting for accounts and develops a portfolio and territory plan to drive intentional selling aligned with strategic priorities.
* Completes required training and obtains relevant product and role certifications aligned to the role and workload/industry.


**Qualifications**
 Required/Minimum Qualifications
   

  

* Proven years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field and a few years technology-related sales or account management experience.
* Experience with major cloud platform (Azure, AWS, or Google Cloud)


**Additional Or Preferred Qualifications**
* Several years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology, or related field AND Proven years technology-related sales or account management experience OR Master's Degree in Business Administration (i.e., MBA), Information Technology, or related field AND A few years technology-related sales or account management experience.
* Proven years solution or services sales experience.
* Swedish language skills preferred.


 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: Application Consultant Trainee
description:
**Are you ready to kick-start your career with our European Trainee Program?** 




 We are on the lookout for trainees to join us on our growth journey.
 



  





 Do you want to work with customer-oriented programming across many industries and transform our customers problems into creative technical solutions on a daily basis? Are you technically curious and want to gain more experience in programming? If the answer is yes, then this is the job for you!
 



  





**Building the future for our customers** 




 Lime CRM is a platform with infinite possibilities to customize according to the needs and ways of working of our end users. Your job involves everything from installation, adaptation and development of additional services connected to our CRM system.
 



  





 To be a great Application Consultant at Lime, you have already identified that coding is something you enjoy. But not to worry, we don’t expect you to be an expert in everything before you start – this is a journey where you will develop along the way!
 



  





 Your days will not be just about coding. It’s a 75/25 split between programming and technical project management. One day you develop in SQL and manage integrations using SSIS and Rest API. The next day you might work on tailored customization in Python, HTML, or JavaScript. When you are not coding you are joining costumer’s meetings, workshops, or internal meetings to create solutions for our end users. You will work at one of our awesome offices with a team that together creates the best experiences for our users.
 



  





**An Application Consultant at Lime…** 




 · Creates mappings of data structures between objects.
 



 · Develops front-end components that interact with Lime.
 



 · Contributes to solution design and development of integrations with third-party systems.
 



 · Codes automatic triggers that run based on user actions in the system.
 



 · Reviews code, write tests for your own or others’ code. Quality assurance.
 



 · Plans and estimate of time use related to tasks and projects. High independence in how you control and plan your tasks.
 



 · Works with different programming languages such as Python, SQL and Typescript.
 



 · Has full professional proficiency in Swedish and English.
 



 · Has a relevant academic degree within IT, Engineering, Information Systems, or equivalent.
 



  





**What is the European Trainee Program?** 




 With our trainee program, we promise you a unique opportunity to kick start your career. Faced with interesting challenges from day one, your learning curve will rise rapidly. Throughout the program, you will be mentored by a senior colleague providing support.
 



  





 The trainee program kicks off with two weeks at our HQ in Lund, Sweden. Together with all trainees from our different offices, you will get intense training and education as well as plenty of time for team building and having fun. After the intro period, you head back to your local office and start working hands-on with everything you have learned, combined with more education throughout the year.
 



  





**Are you our next star?** 




 The trainee program starts in January and August every year. Apply asap!
 



  





 Welcome to Lime!

title: IT Business Engagement Manager
description:
**Grow with us**
 You want to be part of bringing digital transformations to life at Ericsson? In Enterprise IT we work in close collaboration with our business stakeholders to co-create digital solutions and secure delivery of IT capabilities for top prioritized business and process areas.
   

  

  

  

**About this opportunity:**
 We are seeking an IT Business Engagement Manager to lead and support on IT engagements & IT deliverables towards Product-, Next-generation Software and Network Deployment Project Business Flows in Portfolio-to-Cash, and for key strategic Group or Business Area initiatives.
   

  

 We are here to ensure timely value delivery in all phases from conceptual design to released functionality supporting adoption. Here, you act as the Enterprise IT interface and represent EIT accountability to business stakeholders, including ensuring relevant operational governance. You will be accountable for extracting main risks and issues, drive mitigation and response on escalations, and follow-up with Sponsors. You will report to Madelene Gustavsson, Head of Business Flow, in Product Area Customer Experience, Enterprise IT in this role.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Facilitate alignment between execution teams, monitor progress, mitigate risks, and collaborate with stakeholders, ensuring timely and efficient execution aligned with transformation goals.
* Support the mobilization of Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and Product Owners to spearhead critical projects.
* Secure collaboration, communication, and governance within the Enterprise IT organization and stakeholders, driving key strategic initiatives forward
* Secure proposed solutions become scalable, stable and secure, and compliant with IT architectural strategy, IT processes & fundamentals before moving to production
* Facilitate the handover to the responsible IT Line organisation, ensuring seamless transition and continuity, including guiding principles’ adherence, follow-up on roles, and required competencies and capacity.
* Drive demand management between EIT and your business stakeholder, ensuring competence availability on time.
* Ensure IT Operations budget is secured for successful delivery


**The Skills You Bring**
* 5+ years of experience in executing Digital Transformation within Business and IT
* Experience of managing large-scale IT deliveries involving multiple system domains
* Proven strengths to manage stakeholder expectations and aligning digital initiatives vs business priorities
* Experience from agile development using agile delivery methodologies in an enterprise setting
* Good understanding of IT digital technologies, processes and tools
* Experience of complexities to large system landscapes with multiple integrations


**About You**
* You initiate action, curiously seek opportunities and mitigate risks, and adopt flexibly to follow through and deliver results
* You build trust, good working relationships, and communicate and collaborate effectively
* Informal leadership capability, with demonstrated ability to encourage and mobilize cross-functional teams toward shared objectives.


**Good to have**
* PMI or PMP certification (preferred)
* A bachelor’s or master’s degree in a relevant field
* Business experience from BA/MA/CU (preferred)


***Preferred location: Stockholm. However, remote location in nearby time-zone may also be considered.***

title: Operations Associate - Supply Activation
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 Are you a detail-oriented team player excited to dive into the foundation of Delivery Operations at Wolt by working in the Courier Activation team? Do you enjoy working in a highly-dynamic, fast faced and execution minded environment? Are you passionate about helping others, be they friends, customers, partners or colleagues? If this sounds like you, we'd love to chat!
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

 The Courier Activation team ensures that the right number of Courier Partners are activated based on each city’s needs, whether that means engaging newly ready-to-deliver couriers, activating active ones, or re-engaging those who have churned.
   

  

 As an Operations Associate, you’ll focus on engaging Courier Partners during key moments when additional supply is needed to balance demand; such as undersupply periods, special events, weather disruptions, and city launches or re-launches. In these moments, timely activation is essential to maintaining strong operational performance.
   

  

**Day-to-day in this role you’ll:**
* Identifying activation opportunities to improve courier availability across the region, supporting a high-quality experience for customers, Courier Partners, and merchants
* Owning the end-to-end execution of activation campaigns, from setting up payment rules to crafting and delivering communications
* Collaborating with other OPS & Support teams and responding to their activation-related queries
* Contributing to the development and execution of projects that enhance activation efficiency
* Sharing ideas for improvement with the wider Operations team and across Wolt, including Delivery Operations, Courier Experience, and Product teams


 Our humble expectations\*
   

  

* You have excellent interpersonal skills - you will be working with awesome people from diverse backgrounds across countries in the northern region of Europe (Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Iceland, Luxembourg and the Baltics)
* You have excellent or native-level proficiency in both verbal and written English. Other languages from the Nordic regions are a big plus!
* You are strong at working with deadlines and are not afraid of voluminous tasks
* You are highly detail-oriented and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment
* You preferably have experience in customer service or similar and are keen to solve problems
* You are tech savvy and a quick learner
* You have a can-do attitude and are ready to roll up your sleeves and get to work in a high-growth and evolving environment
* Bonus skills: you are strong at working with data and basic tools (such as Google Sheets) or Iterable


 What we offer
   

  

* Meaningful impact - Your work directly influences courier availability and customer experience across multiple cities and countries.
* Dynamic environment - No two days are the same. You’ll work on fast-paced activations tied to real-time needs
* Room to grow - Share your ideas, lead projects, and help shape how we engage Courier Partners across the region.
* People-first culture - At Wolt, we put people at the center - whether it’s Courier Partners, customers, merchants, or you.


 Next steps\*
   

  

 If you are excited about working in a high-growth environment, taking ownership, and being part of an extremely ambitious team, then click below to apply and get the conversation going! We highly recommend including a brief cover letter to help your application stand out.
   

  

 We will be reviewing applications and inviting people to interviews on an on-going basis, so we encourage sending your application ASAP.
   

  

 Please note that we do
 **not** 
 accept applications coming in via email. Please submit your application via our job portal.
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Workforce Manager to Workforce Management & Process team | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
The payment industry and the card business are currently being rapidly transformed due to changes in consumer behavior, development of new technologies, new fast-moving competitors and roll-out of new regulations. SEB Kort is the Nordic market leader, both in terms of technology and market share and has set an ambitious strategic agenda to navigate through this.
   

  

 Are you change driven and want to take part in SEB Kort's transformation journey? Workforce Management & Process team at SEB Kort are now looking for driven, analytic and service minded person.
   

  

**About The Role**
 To adapt to the changing industry, meet customer expectations and the strategic agenda we´re on a transformation journey and are now looking for a Workforce Manager to join Team WFM & Process. The team currently handles scheduling and forecasting for our 1st line, real-time optimization, process optimizations and improvements. As a Workforce Manager you will be responsible for the telephony architecture in SEB Kort. In this role, you will have close collaboration with others in WFM & Process and other telephone responsible in SEB Group in order to optimize accessibility in our various channels.
   

  

**Your overall responsibility will be (but not limited to)**
* Telephony architecture in SEB Kort
* Develop and deliver data-driven analyses for leadership and key stakeholders
* Communication with stakeholders
* Workforce Management related tasks such as scheduling and real time optimization


 Who we are looking for
   

  

 We are looking for you who have great personal drive, the ability to switch between small details and large overall issues, that you can put yourself in the perspective of the customer, the employee and SEB Kort. You enjoy clear routine tasks as well as quickly throwing yourself into a new project and quickly coming to a decision. You are a good communicator and you should have experience working in Excel and Calabrio. We see that you have previous experience of working in a contact center.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Detail oriented
* Great communications skills in a Nordic language and English, both oral and in writing.
* Customer focused


 What we offer
   

  

* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Work-life balance
* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Empowering environment


 Do you want to be part of SEB?
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **9th of November 2025** 
 . If you have questions about the position, please contact Veronica Stenroos, Head of WFM & Process at veronica.stenroos@seb.se , but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career

title: Regional Director Sales Engineering, Northern Europe
description:
Why Join Us?
   

  

 At Check Point, we are seeking a seasoned and visionary leader to head our
 **Sales Engineering team for the Northern European region** 
 , which forms part of our
 **Western Europe organization** 
 .
   

  

 Northern Europe is one of the largest and most strategic regions for Check Point in EMEA. In this high-impact role, you will work closely with the Western Europe management team and your peer SE Directors, while reporting directly to the
 **VP of Sales Engineering, Western Europe** 
 .
   

  

 You will be responsible for defining and executing the regional pre-sales strategy, including planning, enablement, and resourcing. Your leadership will be instrumental in driving growth, strengthening customer success, and accelerating the adoption of Check Point’s cutting-edge cybersecurity technologies. Experience leading teams through
 **digital transformation** 
 or similar complex technology shifts is a strong advantage.
   

  

 This role requires approximately
 **50% travel** 
 across the region, and you will engage directly with customers and partners as a
 **trusted C-level peer and advisor** 
 , representing Check Point’s strategic and technical vision at the executive level.
   

  

 Check Point is a global leader in cybersecurity, offering an integrated portfolio of solutions across network, cloud, and endpoint security - helping organizations worldwide protect what matters most.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Lead, inspire, and develop a high-performing Sales Engineering organization across Northern Europe, ensuring operational excellence and talent development.
* Partner with the Western Europe leadership team to define and execute strategic objectives that drive business growth and customer success.
* Act as a strategic C-level advisor to key customers and partners, shaping their cybersecurity vision and long-term technology roadmap.
* Ensure all SEs are fully enabled, up to date on emerging technologies, and delivering exceptional value to customers and partners.
* Monitor and drive key KPIs, ensuring consistent performance and alignment with corporate objectives.
* Represent Check Point as a spokesperson and thought leader in executive forums, industry events, and market engagements.
* Drive innovation to enhance pre-sales efficiency, customer engagement, and solution delivery.
* Stay ahead of market trends and collaborate across business units to influence strategic direction and product development.


**Qualifications**
* Minimum 10 years of experience in cybersecurity or IT, with senior leadership in pre-sales or technical sales.
* Proven executive leadership experience managing and developing Sales Engineering teams.
* Strong understanding of the cybersecurity market, enterprise customer environments, and evolving technology trends.
* Analytical and strategic thinker with a results-driven, action-oriented mindset.
* Excellent communication, influencing, and presentation skills at the executive level.
* Familiarity with Salesforce.com or similar CRM tools is an advantage.
* Bachelor’s degree in Business Management, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
* A proactive, creative problem solver who thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.


**It Would Be Great If You Also Have**
* A strong technical background in cybersecurity architecture or emerging technologies.
* A collaborative leadership style that inspires teams and fosters excellence.
* A genuine belief in continuous learning and growth - for yourself and those you lead.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we’re looking for a passionate Backend Engineer to join our Native E-commerce team in Stockholm. In this role, you’ll take on meaningful technical challenges and work closely with cross-functional teams to build products that empower millions of merchants worldwide. If this sounds exciting, read on — the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Essential Responsibilities:**
* Delivers complete solutions spanning all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) (design, implementation, testing, delivery and operations), based on definitions from more senior roles.
* Advises immediate management on project-level issues
* Guides junior engineers
* Operates with little day-to-day supervision, making technical decisions based on knowledge of internal conventions and industry best practices
* Applies knowledge of technical best practices in making decisions


**Expected Qualifications:**
* 3+ years relevant experience and a Bachelor’s degree OR Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


**Additional Responsibilities And Preferred Qualifications**
**Meet our Team**
 The Native E-commerce team is building the foundation for a new way to sell online. Our mission is to make it effortless for micro-merchants and small businesses to launch and grow their online stores. We’re combining conversational AI for intuitive store setup, flexible backend services, and seamless PayPal payments to help anyone start selling in minutes and scale as they grow. This role is an unique opportunity for your to contribute in shaping the future of commerce.
   

  

**Your day-to-day**
 As a Backend Engineer, you’ll contribute to designing and delivering high-quality solutions while learning from and collaborating closely with your team. Your day-to-day will include:
   

  

* Developing and implementing solutions with growing ownership and confidence.
* Making thoughtful technical decisions and seeking feedback or guidance when needed.
* Balancing trade-offs in system design, scalability, and performance.
* Breaking down complex problems, asking the right questions, and helping to shape practical solutions.
* Contributing to team discussions, sharing ideas, and helping improve how the team builds and delivers software.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Solid experience with RESTful API development and microservice architecture.
* Hands-on work with Java and familiarity with testing frameworks and practices.
* Understanding of system design fundamentals and production-grade backend systems.


**Get bonus points if you also have...**
* Experience with Kotlin and deploying to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, or similar).
* Exposure to containerization (Docker) and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Grafana or Datadog.
* Understanding or experience with event-driven architecture or message-based systems.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested in knowing more? Don't hesitate to apply and/or let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 \_
   

  

 PayPal does not charge candidates any fees for courses, applications, resume reviews, interviews, background checks, or onboarding. Any such request is a red flag and likely part of a scam. To learn more about how to identify and avoid recruitment fraud please visit https://careers.pypl.com/contact-us.
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset-you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life.
